welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pulaski, a charming city known for its historic landmarks and scenic beauty. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New River Valley Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at New River Valley Airport is dedicated to serving private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Virginia Tech Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Virginia Tech Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
